document.full_text: the u.s. has given approval for the iconic italian wine brunello di montalcino, which had been involved in a quality scandal, to be imported into the country.
document.title: u.s. gives approval for import of '06 brunello wine
lines_and_colors: the u.s. has given approval for the iconic italian wine brunello di montalcino, which had been involved in a quality scandal, to be imported into the country.
